application.description: name of the application to associate with this configuration template

environmentId.description: The ID of the environment used with this configuration template

name.description: A unique name for this Template.

settings.description:
Option settings to configure the new Environment. These
override specific values that are set as defaults. The format is detailed
below in Option Settings

solutionStackName.description:
A solution stack to base your Template
off of. Example stacks can be found in the [Amazon API documentation][1]
